thread.title: Drones Are Watching: Railroad Irks Workers With Unmanned Aircraft

author: Paul Ziobro
title: Drones Are Watching: Railroad Irks Workers With Unmanned Aircraft
text:
Union Pacific Corp. riled employees recently when it started flying drones over some of its railroad yards to ensure workers were following safety guidelines.
The aerial spotters were looking for any number of behaviors that deviate from the railroadâ€™s rule book, from passing between railcars that are less than 100 feet apart to climbing off moving equipment.
